about_the_game:
PLOT

In 2040, humanity first discovered extraterrestrial life – they found it in the neighboring stellar system Epsilon Eridani on the ocean planet Aegir. An expedition of scientists established a research station on a planetary satellite orbiting Aegir, but once settled they went silent.


A new expedition is sent and upon arrival learns the grave news: this is not just the local fauna, but something insidious and ruthless that has come from the depths of space. Communication with the Earth is down again and your team are the only ones who can fix everything... Or... Maybe there is no need and it would be best to let events play out naturally, as horrific as they seem. The decision is yours.

PROTAGONIST

You are Max Asimov, a space communications engineer and a member of the second expedition. Your team's mission is to learn what happened to the previous crew, study the alien life forms, and reestablish stable contact with the Earth.


Since childhood you have been obsessed with radio, technology, and the romance of space. Passion has turned into profession and now you find yourself in the other stellar system where extraterrestrial life has been discovered.

Your daughter lies gravely ill in a coma back home on Earth, you have no chance of affording the procedure that can save her life if it weren't for the compensation this expedition offers. Will you be able to return and see her again?

GAMEPLAY

  • Search for clues and evidence to the previous team's fate.
  • Bring life support and security systems back online to move deeper into the compound.
  • Avoiding alien creatures at all costs, combat is not an option.
  • Use the Lazarus, a machine who's user plunges into an artificial dream indistinguishable from real life, to sort out your mind and regain your strength.
  • Understand the true goals of alien creatures and choose your side.

name: Epsilon Eridana
short_description: Epsilon Eridana is a story-driven sci-fi survival horror with a heavy focus on exploration. Your goal is to investigate what happened to the crew of abandoned space base and unravel the terryfying secrets of the first extraterrestrial contact.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Italian
*languages with full audio support
